graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:SupportCreateCommentInput!)
{
	supportCreateComment (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		issueId
		accountId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	supportGetComments (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	supportFindComment (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	supportFindCommentById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:SupportUpdateCommentInput!)
{
	supportUpdateComment (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	supportDeleteCommentById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	supportDeleteComments (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		externalId
		accountUsername
		displayName
		description
		attachments
		screenRecording
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
